sentences.english: Place whipping cream, coconut juice and milk in a sauce pot and boil.
sentences.chinese: 鮮奶油，椰汁和牛奶入鍋煮沸。

sentences.english: Mix egg whites and milk. Add seasoning and crab meat and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白與鮮奶拌勻，加入調味料與蟹肉拌勻。

sentences.english: Beat egg white with ginger juice and milk. Stir in sugar syrup.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白混和薑汁及鮮奶，打勻後加入涼了的糖水。

sentences.english: Pour Malibu Liqueur into coffee cup. Add coffee. Top with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡杯入瑪麗寶椰香利口酒再入咖啡，上加鮮奶油。

sentences.english: Remove from heat, then stir in flour, gradually pour in milk and cook until thickened.
sentences.chinese: 離火拌入麪粉，徐徐倒入鮮奶，回爐煮至濃稠。

sentences.english: The fresh milk is over there beside the juice machine.
sentences.chinese: 鮮奶在那兒，就在果汁機旁邊。

sentences.english: I add fresh milk to the oats and take them hot.
sentences.chinese: 我在燕麥片上加鮮奶，煮熱了喫。

sentences.english: Whip up the cream and fold in mascarpone cheese with green tea powder.
sentences.chinese: 鮮奶油打發後與馬士卡彭乳酪和綠茶粉拌勻成奶油糊。

sentences.english: Unmold. Serve immediately with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 喫的時候可以配上鮮奶油。

sentences.english: A bumper crop of recent illness related to raw milk accentuates the problem.
sentences.chinese: 最近關於鮮奶的一系列疾病更加重了這個問題。

sentences.english: Fresh milk, espresso, chocolate flavors with a splash of Kahlua.
sentences.chinese: 香醇的鮮奶，義式濃縮咖啡，巧克力風味的絕妙組合。

sentences.english: Some fresh berries and whipped cream would be divine on these as well.
sentences.chinese: 新鮮莓類和鮮奶油淋在上面也無比美味。

sentences.english: Italy coffee, sugar, cream and cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 意式咖啡，糖包，鮮奶油和肉桂粉。

sentences.english: Instead, I would use buses to deliver fresh milk to housing blocks.
sentences.chinese: 我啊，我會利用公交系統將鮮奶送到居民區。

sentences.english: Raw milk advocates also claim that pasteurization destroys key nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 鮮奶擁護者同時也宣稱滅菌過程破壞了重要的營養素。

sentences.english: Pour into the wok, add the creme fraiche and warm through, stirring.
sentences.chinese: 將其倒入鍋中，加入鮮奶油加熱攪勻。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
